name: nova-transport
description: Full-stack Nova Transport ride-hailing app with React and Node.js

scripts.install-all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && npm start
